cells.data: -- takeIterate n f x == [x, f x, f (f x), ...]

-- takeIterate :: Int -> (a -> a) -> a -> [a]
on takeIterate(n, f, x)
    set v to x
    set vs to {v}
    tell mReturn(f)
        repeat with i from 1 to n - 1
            set v to |Î»|(v)
            set end of vs to v
        end repeat
    end tell
    return vs
end takeIterate
